title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5600.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5600.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part, governing public access to certain records of the

New York State Mortgage Loan Enforcement and Administration Corporation, hereinafter referred to as the corporation, is promulgated for the purpose of
implementing the provisions of the Freedom of Information Law (article 6 of the

Public Officers Law). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5600.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
